Package main.java

Class Product

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.java.Product
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CleaningProduct, FoodProduct, FurnitureProduct
    abstract class Product
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class that represents a usual Product, this class extends into different types of Products.
    Author:
    Eduardo Nunes

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private int currentStock
      Current stock of the product
      private java.lang.String identifier
      Identifier of the product (barcode)
      private java.lang.String name
      Name of the product
      protected double pricePerUnit
      Price per unit of the product - this variable is protected because it is used in the different types of products
      protected double shippingprice
      Shipping price associated with the product - this variable is protected because it is used in the different types of products
      protected double totalPrice
      Total price of the product - this variable is protected because it is used in the different types of products

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor Description
      protected Product​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String identifier, double pricePerUnit, int currentStock)
      Constructor of the class Product, it initializes the name, identifier, current stock, price per unit and total price of the product.

                  java.lang.String identifier,
                  double pricePerUnit,

    • Method Detail

      • removeun

        public void removeun​(int nr)
        Method that updates the current stock of the product by removing the quantity of the product that was ordered in the currentStock variable.
        Parameters:
        nr - Number of units to be removed from the current stock
